reporting-org.narrative: Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)

title.narrative: Lebanon DRC: Protection of women at risk

description.narrative: Discrimination against women and sexual gender based violence in particular are a widespread phenomena in Lebanon as well as in other Middle Eastern countries. This project phase II consolidates and continues the work started in phase I through strengthening the assistance to women at risk of GBV and a better and coordinated advocacy on their behalf at national level. It will help promoting a better economic and personal self-reliance of vulnerable women and raise awareness of duty-bearers about GBV. A Women Resource Centre, which serves as a safe place for women at risk, will be a central part of this project. It is considered to be a pilot in Lebanon and UNHCR will support DRC to replicate this centre in five other places in the country to provide a safe space for Syrian refugee women at risk of GBV.
